/usr/local/cuda/bin/nvcc  -g -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/cuda_testprj.dir/cuda_testprj_generated_main.cu.o CMakeFiles/cuda_testprj.dir/chapter5/cuda_testprj_generated_sharedMemoryTest.cu.o -o CMakeFiles/cuda_testprj.dir/cmake_device_link.o   -L/home/lgj/test_cudaprj/CUDA_LIBS  -L/usr/local/cuda/lib64/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda/lib64  /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart_static.a -ldl  -lpthread -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt
